text.autoconfig.wynn-wanderer.title: Wynn Wanderer Configuration
text.autoconfig.wynn-wanderer.option.ter: Territory Titles
Settings for territory title display
Enable Territory Titles
Show Only Significant Territories
When enabled, only major cities and important locations will show titles
Disable to show titles for all territories
Appearance Settings
Visual settings for territory titles
Title Text Color
Text color in RGB hex format (without #)
Title Text Size
Scale factor for the title text
Show Text Shadow
Whether to show a shadow behind the title text
Subtitle Text Size
Scale factor for the subtitle text
Position Settings
Control where territory titles appear on screen
Title Vertical Position
Vertical position of the main title on the screen
Negative values move the title up
Positive values move the title down
Title Horizontal Position
Horizontal position of the main title on the screen
Negative values move the title left
Positive values move the title right
Subtitle Vertical Position
Vertical position of the subtitle on the screen
Negative values move the subtitle up
Positive values move the subtitle down
Subtitle Horizontal Position
Horizontal position of the subtitle on the screen
Negative values move the subtitle left
Positive values move the subtitle right
Center Text
Whether to center the title text on the screen
If enabled, horizontal and vertical positions are
relative to the center of the screen
Animation Settings
Control how territory titles animate
Title Fade-In Time
How long the fade-in text effect lasts, in ticks.
20 ticks = 1 second.
Title Display Time
How long the title stays visible, in ticks.
20 ticks = 1 second.
Title Fade-Out Time
How long the fade-out text effect lasts, in ticks.
20 ticks = 1 second.
Title Cooldown Time
Minimum time between territory title displays in ticks.
Prevents title spam when moving between territories quickly.
Recent Territory Cache Size
Number of recently visited territories to remember
Used to prevent title spam when moving between
the same few territories
Significant Territory Settings
Settings for major cities and important locations
Use Enhanced Styling
Apply special formatting to significant territories
Title Size Multiplier
How much larger significant territory titles should be
Subtitle Size Multiplier
How much larger significant territory subtitles should be
Use Custom Colors
Whether to use custom colors defined in language files
Resource packs can override these colors
Default Color
Default color for significant territories if custom colors are not found
